audio_description: Hello Foodies, welcome to Wish My Food. Today’s special is Mughlai Chicken Dum Biryani. Compared to regular dum biryani, this one is much more aromatic, tastier, and rich in flavors. It’s also very easy and uses readily available ingredients.

audio_description: Add 1/4 tsp turmeric, 1/4 tsp cardamom powder, 1/4 tsp pepper powder, 1 star anise, 1-inch cinnamon, 5–6 cloves, 1 tsp shahi jeera, 1 marathi moggu (kapok bud), and a biryani leaf. Add everything to the chicken as marinade.
